DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate reliability uncalibrated cardiac index monitoring base arterial waveform analysis patient undergo off-pump coronary artery bypass grafting .
DOC.brief_title: Reliability Cardiac Output Monitoring Based Uncalibrated Pulse Contour Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: Using contemporary statistical method cardiac index value obtain via uncalibrated pulse contour analysis Pro AQT system compare traditional transpulmonary thermodilution technique ( Pulsion , Germany ) .
DOC.criteria: elective offpump coronary artery bypass graft age < 18 > 80 year , preoperative ejection fraction < 0.35 , severe cardiac valve dysfunction peripheral vascular disease , constant atrial fibrillation , simultaneous intervention ( carotid endarterectomy , aneurysm repair , etc . ) , transfer cardiopulmonary bypass .
